title: Sion bleed
body:
So idk if anyone has posted about this but I'm still doing it.
So I've been using Sion quite a bit lately and noticed that he says; "I do not bleed." 
But if you go against a Darius he definitely does bleed.
Should it be something to be that should be fixed? Riot?

replies.body: If {{summoner:14}}Ignite can still hurt {{champion:63}}Brand, {{champion:14}}Sion can bleed.

It's basically a question of balance. If certain champions become immune to certain "types" of damage, the game would basically become a pokemon MOBA. 

Which is something that could be made and be pretty funny.
#760+ Champions
